PhysicalModel Class Reference

#include <physicalmodel.h>

Inheritance diagram for PhysicalModel:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Base class of all physical models to be used in CSIM simulations.

These models take input from readouts and produce one or more outputs to analog synapses. Within a transform function you can also receive input from any external source.

  • PhysicalModel (int input_channels, int output_channels)
  • virtual ~PhysicalModel (void)
  • virtual int advance (void)
    Calculates the next output of the physical model.

  • virtual int addOutgoing (Advancable *Outgoing)
    This method will be called if this object wants to send information to object Outgoing.

    Connect an output channel of the model to a synapse.

Protected Attributes

  • Advancable ** incoming
    A list of incoming model-inputs.
  • int nIncoming
    Number of inputs.
  • int nIncomingAlloc
    Current size of array (in number of inputs) allocated for inputs.
  • AnalogSynapse *** outgoing
    An array of outgoing synapses.
  • int * nOutgoing
    Number of outgoing synapses per channel.
  • int * nOutgoingAlloc
    Current size of array (in number of synapses) allocated for outgoing synapses per channel.
  • int nOutputChannels
    Number of output channels.
  • map< string, int > input_channel_names
    Mapping of input-channel names to indices.
  • map< string, int > output_channel_names
    Mapping of output-channel names to indices.

Private Attributes

  • double ** inputs
    Storage for input value-pointers.
  • double * outputs
    Storage for output values.
  • int last_input_index
    Last registered input index.
  • int last_output_index
    Last registered output index.
